Job Description:
- Routinely visit branches to conduct official check and review of credit files to ensure for compliance with
policies and good credit quality control.
- Review loan borrower’s business, repayments capacity, collateral property and other credit conditions from
the credit file and verify with actual site visit on sampling basis to ensure the accuracy of credit application.
- Notify immediately to immediate supervisor upon finding of any serious issue and coordinate to investigate
the issues if it involves any internal fraud.
- Conduct training to frontline credit officer during on-site visit to improve credit assessment skills.
- Perform other tasks assigned by immediate supervisor/management.
Job Requirement:
- Minimum 4th year or fresh graduate in Finance and Banking, Accounting and any other related fields.
- Experiences in Credit Review/Credit Evaluation, Audit or Quality Control is a plus.
- Good English writing and speaking skills.
- Good analytical and judgment skills.
- Ability to communicate with other related departments/branches effectively.
- Able to travel to provinces.

Company Profile: Urban Hub Cambodia is a multi-award-winner and one of Cambodia’s biggest fully licensed real estate developers. We are committed to developing projects that provide the new generations of Cambodia with exceptional modern living and experience of the first world that focuses on “LIVE, WORK, PLAY” yet preserving the Cambodian tradition and identity of community living.Registered in 2017, Urban Hub Cambodia is a joint venture between a Hong Kong-based conglomerate, Goldfame Group, the largest Hong Kong investor in Cambodia since 1992, and a Cambodian-American real estate company, Urban Living Solutions. Urban Hub Cambodia has quickly become a leading mixed-use property developer and the first developer ever from Cambodia to win the most awards including two major regional awards, “Best Condo Development in Asia 2019” and “Best Co-working Space in Asia 2020” at Asia’s longest-running and most respected property awards organized by PropertyGuru. Urban Hub Cambodia is behind the four most award-winning Cambodian projects both locally and regionally, including Urban Loft, Factory Phnom Penh, Urban Village Phase 1, and Urban Village Phase 2. More projects are expected in the near future.

Job Description:
Executive Summary:
Our client offers an executive a unique and exciting opportunity to lead and inspire in a rapidly growing and dynamic market with a very high patient unmet need. Our client is a company with a >25-year history, and its ongoing success is based on a strong focus on delivering meaningful value for its customers and society. It will need to evolve its offering and approach to continue to do so.

Reporting to the divisional head, the Associate Director, is responsible for strategies, implement and achieve sales goals for the assigned businesses. The Associate Director would achieve monthly, quarterly, and annual sales targets with the aim of deeper market penetration and maintain outstanding customer relationships. The individual will also be responsible for creating and executing coherent product differentiation for our client’s medical devices products, play an important role in growing share, empower and add value to the divisional sales team to this fast paced and mission critical effort.

You will be a member of our client’s transformation by delivering the most outstanding value beyond our current business base and making a meaningful difference to customers, patients, and society. You always put patients at the centre of our operations and ensure everything we do will sustainably benefit patients and bring value to the community.

Job Description:
Under limited supervision, general direction from the HoD and in accordance with all applicable government laws, regulations and client’s policies, procedures and guidelines, this position will:

- Create, implement, and improvise commercial strategies and activities to achieve sales goals for the division.
- Achieve monthly, quarterly, and annual targets for the division for each product segment.
- Manage a team of area managers, product manager, sales specialists, and field service engineers in the country.
- Build and lead a high-performing sales and service team via hiring and strong retention, and in collaboration with the HR team and functional leaders.
- Ensures team members/direct reports manage assigned customers well while meeting their deliverables and sales targets effectively.
- Adequately respond to competitive threats.
- Launch new products and develop appropriate pricing strategies for the division to increase penetration, gain share and drive profitability.
- Responsible for communicating business related issues or opportunities to next management level (HoD).
- Oversee order fulfillment by working closely with internal stakeholders such as RA, QA, CS, Logistics, Marketing and Order management team to remove key hurdles to drive on time delivery.
- Maintaining outstanding relationship with customers and build a key opinion leader advisory and partnership with related society and academic societies.

Company Profile: Urban Hub Cambodia is a multi-award-winner and one of Cambodia’s biggest fully licensed real estate developers. We are committed to developing projects that provide the new generations of Cambodia with exceptional modern living and experience of the first world that focuses on “LIVE, WORK, PLAY” yet preserving the Cambodian tradition and identity of community living.Registered in 2017, Urban Hub Cambodia is a joint venture between a Hong Kong-based conglomerate, Goldfame Group, the largest Hong Kong investor in Cambodia since 1992, and a Cambodian-American real estate company, Urban Living Solutions. Urban Hub Cambodia has quickly become a leading mixed-use property developer and the first developer ever from Cambodia to win the most awards including two major regional awards, “Best Condo Development in Asia 2019” and “Best Co-working Space in Asia 2020” at Asia’s longest-running and most respected property awards organized by PropertyGuru. Urban Hub Cambodia is behind the four most award-winning Cambodian projects both locally and regionally, including Urban Loft, Factory Phnom Penh, Urban Village Phase 1, and Urban Village Phase 2. More projects are expected in the near future.

Job Description:
Reporting Line: Managing Director

Key objectives of the role

- Developing a Strategic Marketing Plan for each brand (all business under EFG Cambodia) with initial focus on Dairy Queen, Kamu Kamu and Hungry?
- Long term objective will be to develop and review annually a Strategic Marketing Plan for each of EFGs brand portfolio, including new brand acquisitions and new countries.
- This will involve understanding the brands DNA, market research, where applicable, including organizing focus groups internally and with consumers to understand and explore consumer insights and areas of potential differentiation
- The Group Strategic Marketing Manager will provide leadership, guidance, and direction to EFGs Creative Leader and Store Design Leader to ensure the strategic marketing vision is articulated via our creative marketing collateral and store design.
- Other duties assigned by senior management
Job Requirement:
Job Requirement

1. Experienced in senior manager and strategic  level  preferably of multi brand, multi-site operations and leadership of a marketing team . Ideally experienced research and study about customer behavior and marketing research.
2. Strong Planning and Organization Skills, Digital Innovation and Creativity
3. Personality Traits - energy, enthusiasm, passion, dynamism, results driven, action orientated, prepared to take risks (step out of comfort zone), team player, influencer, strong communicator, user of digital media.
4. Love to challenge and having sense of urgency .
5. Travel Requirement: Yes



Due to a large number of applicants, we will only be able to follow up with candidates who are shortlisted for an interview, and this will happen within 10 working days from the date of your application.
Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.
Contact Info: Contact Information EFG Cambodia   017 888 349 efgcareer@rmagroup.net #320, Mao Tse Tong Blvd, Sangkat Tek Laak 1, Khan Toul Kok 017 888 349

Job Description:
Key Responsibilities

- Handle registration process and compliance of Company's food & beverage stores with relevant authorities, including Ministry of Commerce, General Department of Taxation, Ministry of Tourism, Ministry of Health, Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training, Minstry of Interior, Ministry of Land Management, Urban Planning and Construction, Ministry of Environment etc.

  - Keep record of company's license and permit for the food & beverage business. - Handle regulatory compliance for closing stores with the relevant authorities.

- Ensure the compliance and other filling necessary for the bussiness operation in accordance with the local law, including commercial law, labor law etc. 

- Keep up to date with the new requirement from the relevant authorities for the operation of the company- Keep good communication, relation and network with relevant officials, especially in regard to the inspection by the authorities.

- This include the ability to travel to provinces where our stores are located. 

- Checking and processing of signboard with RKS and the GDT
- Assist to review and process the construction permit with the Ministry of Land Management, Urban Planning and Construction/related government department
- Work with EDC for any electricity related mater
 - Assist supervisor in reviewing legal documents/agreements of the company.
- Assist supervisor in draft and review offical letters and legal documents  to/from third parties (landlords, suppliers, customers) etc.
 - Other tasks as assigned by the line manager.
Job Requirement:
Job Qualification:

- Working experience: minimum 2 years professional work in legal and compliance or related field- Computer skills: Power point, Excel, Power BI, etc.- Education: Bachelor Degree in law or equivalent in related field- Language: Khmer and English

Travel Requirement

This position will be required to travel in Phnom Penh to meet officials and submit application for all the stores.

15% of time will be going to the relevant province that stores are located to work with the provincial department of Labor and vocational training to make compliance done for the store.

Job Description:
•	To grow and maintain portfolio of deposit individual clients through building strong relationships with prospects, networking and by providing proposition and advisory for commercial banking clients on their Cash Management.
•	Proactively cross sell all other products within the Bank including various types of commercial banking product and service.
•	Procure new business through customer acquisition and manage relationships with existing customer
•	Provide sound financial advice and dispensing customized solutions in alignment with the bank's standards and industry regulations
•	Deliver client satisfaction through tailored solutions according to client objectives and service issue resolution
•	To work closely with internal stakeholders including Treasury and Operations Teams to ensure the portfolio meets planned revenue and volume projections.
•	Resolve complaints and issues efficiently and in a timely manner.
•	To assess and manage the potential risks by performing customer due diligence in compliance with all statutory and regulatory requirements as well as the Bank’s internal procedure manuals.
•	Perform other tasks assigned by line supervisor

* Chbar Ampov and Siem Reap Branch
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor in field of Marketing, Business, Management or a similar field/ equivalent
- Intuitive to customers’ needs
- Strong communication and interpersonal skills and the ability to build and maintain relationships
- A background in customer service or sales is a plus
- Must understand customer relationship management (CRM)
- Ability to analyze and solve problems quickly
- Ability to work well with others
- Attentive to detail and organized
- Must be self-motivated, flexible and able to manage several jobs at one time
- Experience as a relationship handling, in customer service, or a similar role.
- Customer-oriented.

* * Our packages are aligned to a “Pay for Performance” principle of rewarding &recognizing good performers.

1. 13th month salary
2. Pchum Ben bonus
3. Annual performance bonus or sales incentive
4. Seniority indemnity payment
5. Term life insurance coverage and personal accident & inpatient
6. Outpatient benefit
7. National Social Security Fund (NSSF)
8. Staff loans
9. Public holidays following Cambodia labor law
10. Leave benefits
11. Five working days per week
12. Learning and development – short courses and development program

* How to apply

Interested candidate should submit ONLY their CV with a cover letter to: Head Office at #27DEF, Monivong
Blvd, Sangkat Srah Chork, Khan Daun Penh, Phnom Penh or by Email: careers@phillipbank.com.kh

* Closing Date: 28-Jan-2023 at 5:00 PM

Note: We regret that only shortlisted candidates will be notified. The application and documents will not be
returned.
Company Profile:
Phillip Bank Plc. is a member of PhillipCapital Group which is headquartered in Singapore, and established since 1975. The Group offers a full range of quality and innovative services to retail, corporate and institutional customers and currently operates in over 15 countries including Australia, Cambodia, China (as well as Hong Kong), France, India, Indonesia, Japan, Malaysia, Singapore, Thailand, Turkey, UK, UAE, USA and Vietnam.  

We were established in Cambodia in 2009 under HwangDBS Commercial Bank Plc. and in 2014, PhillipCapital Group bought it over and renamed it as Phillip Bank. In year 2020, the merger between Phillip Bank Plc. and KREDIT Microfinance Institution Plc. concluded successfully and made us one of the largest commercial bank with more than 80 branches in Cambodia.

Employee experience is our priority in Phillip Bank, in the process of achieving our corporate goals, we will put every effort towards our people’s growth. We are proud of our bank’s culture where: We treat our employee as family members; we always strive to meet our customer’s expectation and we believe in benefitting the communities.

Job Description:
• Assistant in fleet management 
• Coordinate with external stakeholder regarding vehicle repairing, car insurance and other supplies 
• Assists service customers during the morning service rush, when possible
• Supervises all vehicle deliveries, ensuring that each customer Is informed of the vehicle’s warranty details, maintenance requirements and features, particularly those related to safety
• Perform any basic vehicle repairing if needed
• Real-time monitoring movement and fast respond call
• To build and maintain best relationship with all customers
• Solve any related problem to customer in the fast manner 
• Review and keep record for booking/repair and maintenance 
• Ensure all fleet documents are up to date and properly kept
• Check and prepare Driver OT/Per Diem
• Weekly expense report to fleet manager and general manager
• Manage car key, payment request ion for fleet team
• Maintain details of vehicle servicing and ensure vehicle have valid inspection dates 

Other AVIS operation
• Assist AVIS sale team to provide fleet document to/from customer
• Handle complaint/feedback from customer
Job Requirement:
• Bachelor or equivalent in Automotive 
• At least 2 year experiences in transport operation, fleet management
• Vehicle knowledge background and Technical cars knowledge 
• Ability to work accurately with deadlines using their own initiative
• At least handle B2 driving license 
• Computer skills Excel, Word, E-mail, outlook
Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.
Contact Info: Contact Information Bunthoeun Keo (Mr.)  088 222 8261 | 016-061 698 602 recruitment.kh@rmagroup.net #27, St. 134, SangkatMittapheap, Khan 7 Makara, Phnom Penh 088 222 8261 | 016-061 698 602

Company Profile:
Founded under the principle of innovation, FUXIN is Cambodia's first pre-engineered steel buildings manufacturer for industrial application, commercial and retail outlets, storage, logistics, sports and leisure structures.

We thrive to be leader in supplying steel building solutions that are more superior in quality, more cost efficient, more time-saving and environmentally sustainable.

A member of ISI GROUP, FUXIN builds upon extensive experience and expertise of the Group in the area of manufacturing and industrial development. Today we have completed over 450 projects including some of the country’s most well-known projects Aeon Mall Sen Sok Parking Structure, and International Exhibition Hall.

• Report to the Operation Support Manager.
• Collaborate with all other departments/division and employees.
• Closely liaise with RMA Group on policy matters.
External
• Maintain active relationships with key OEMs as required
• Develop and maintain relationships with customer, suppliers, vendors, Government and private sectors.
Functional Responsibilities
• Accounting and finance, Overall assist and work at the division level in order to match the requirement of company.
• Invoice, AR collection and all the process will need to be clean and clear updated from time to time required by management.
• Expense, either cash or credit ... need to be in proper process and control in order to make a smooth operation for business. Especially monitor cost and expense to align with budgeted.
• Staff, overall assist HR policy and process through division administration office. Especially assess performance and provide coaching and guidance to ensure maximum efficiency.
• Oversee receiving, warehousing, distribution and maintenance operations
• Support the operations of division related to all matter. Especially working closely with Supporting Function from head office HR, IT, Finance, Legal and CEO Office.
• You are as management in the AED/HED will need to input your thought and ideas into the department and division in order for us to change and grow the organization without hesitation.
• You might be assign by manager to do other tasks if need.
Sales/Marketing:
• Assist as required all other department to achieve target/ budget/ goal
Financial Responsibilities
• Assist to Manage costs at reasonable levels and in line with budget 
• Actively advise concerns relating to profitability of division.
Job Requirement:
• Educated to at least bachelor degree level or similar and higher.
Knowledge, Skills and Experience:
Essential:
• A minimum of 3 years of related Industry or work
• Possess a very strong business acumen
• Highest level of business acumen
• Good English (written and spoken)
• Fully conversation with Microsoft suite of products and fully computer literate.
Desirable:
• Experience working for/with Multinational company or OEM supplier
• Driver’s License motor vehicle.
Competencies:
• Leadership - Forward thinking and proactive with judgement, direction setting and achieving of targets. Able to lead management and operational teams, creating a climate in which team members have a desire for results and able to realize their potential.
• Management - Able to identify direction for self and others, motivating and effectively managing staffing and resource requirements. Capacity to use judgement and evaluate situations in order to make decisions following through to appropriate action and results.
• Achieving Results - Results driven, able to make sound judgments over competing priorities, use initiative and actively assess the course of action to set and accomplish target.
• Analytical Thinking - Able to simplify complex problems, processes or projects into component parts and explore and evaluate them systematically.
• Flexibility - Adapts easily to change and responds flexibly to a changing and evolving environment, provides momentum when driving change and involves others when building plans for change.
• Resilience - Ability to work under pressure and manage personal effectiveness in face of challenge. Demonstrates an approach to work that is characterized by commitment, energy and motivation. 
• Teamwork - Able to build and maintain effective working relationship with a diverse and multi-cultural workforce in a variety of locations, working cooperatively with others. The ability to build and contribute to a team as well as work independent
Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.
Contact Info: Contact Information RMA CAMBODIA  017888390 recruitment.kh@rmagroup.net #27, St. 134, SangkatMittapheap, Khan 7 Makara, Phnom Penh 017888390

Company Profile: Our vision as a school is to prepare and equip our young people with the knowledge, skills, understanding, and attitude to thrive and then take on the world.Our mission is to provide exceptional care and education to children while fostering each child’s intellectual, social, physical, emotional, and moral development in an academic-rich environment.The curriculum at BISPP has derived from Vision and Mission statements, along with our definition of teaching and learning adapted from the International Early Year Curriculum (IEYC) and Cambridge Curriculum. Job Description:
- Acquire or support to process to on board new perspective Billers, Schools, or B2B and retain existing
alliance partners and work on any assigned task related from line Manager.

plan/campaign to roll-out e-banking e-products/ e-services to potential clients, where appropriate.

all platform with partners’ e-products/e-services to drive quick launch to marketplace.

as NDA, Agreement, and process those to related parties to have branch’s project implement done.

Job Requirement:

- Experience as relationship model, payment and customer services

- Good knowledge in financial banking e-products/e-services banking

- Team-oriented, collaborative, and flexible

Company Profile:
Phillip Bank Plc. is a member of PhillipCapital Group which is headquartered in Singapore, and established since 1975. The Group offers a full range of quality and innovative services to retail, corporate and institutional customers and currently operates in over 15 countries including Australia, Cambodia, China (as well as Hong Kong), France, India, Indonesia, Japan, Malaysia, Singapore, Thailand, Turkey, UK, UAE, USA and Vietnam.  

We were established in Cambodia in 2009 under HwangDBS Commercial Bank Plc. and in 2014, PhillipCapital Group bought it over and renamed it as Phillip Bank. In year 2020, the merger between Phillip Bank Plc. and KREDIT Microfinance Institution Plc. concluded successfully and made us one of the largest commercial bank with more than 80 branches in Cambodia.

Employee experience is our priority in Phillip Bank, in the process of achieving our corporate goals, we will put every effort towards our people’s growth. We are proud of our bank’s culture where: We treat our employee as family members; we always strive to meet our customer’s expectation and we believe in benefitting the communities.

-  Provides information about the retail space in terms renting aspects to client.
-  Explore commercial needs and requirements.
-  Negotiate all terms required to support the Group benefits.
-  Effectively interprets all lease and community policies & regulations to Management.
-  Accurately and efficiently prepares and assists with all leasing paperwork (i.e. applications, lease agreements, employment and credit checks, and lease move-in packets).
-  Effectively communicates any changes in units leased status to related Departments / sections.
-  Maintains an accurate and in-depth knowledge of all aspects of the real estate market, particularly in areas such as rent and pricing information, vacancies, space availability, lease expirations, square footage, etc.
-  Understands and complies with state landlord-tenant local Housing laws and standards. Prepares monthly competitive survey reports and analyzes the real estate market trends and conditions.
-  Monitors all current and future vacancies to proactively react to future needs. Inspects all vacant units on a regular basis to ensure they are ready to show to sub-tenants.
-  Conducts follow-up activity with all sub-tenants in order to establish positive relationships.
-  Represent the Group on all external communication – written, verbal & physical. Advise the Senior Management on any change of contractual terms for any lease.
-  Other tasks assigned by Management.

- Bachelor / Master’s Degree of Marketing, Business Admin or Management
- At least 1 or more years of working experience of leasing and marketing
- Have knowledge of a leasing, marketing and sales
- Be an excellent communicator, negotiator and think creatively
- Work well in a team and be well presented with a professional manner
- Be a problem solver, able to work under pressure with high responsibility
- Good analytical and decision-making skills
- Tactful and discrete when dealing with people

Implement 7S (5S, Safety and Security) at Plant areas to ensure the efficiency and improvements in the work environment.6.	Conduct Root Cause Failure Analysis (RCFA), identify problems, and take prompt action on reliable repair and maintenance service responding to problems occurred.7.	Complete daily operation report, maintenance plan, and building maintenance and report to Supervisor, Electrical and Automation to monitor maintenance and inspection plans8.	Other tasks will be assigned time to time

Job Description: - រៀបចំផែនការការងារប្រចាំថ្ងៃបានច្បាស់លាស់ ហើយរបាយការណ៍ទៅប្រធានផ្នែក។- មានសមត្ថភាពដោះស្រាយរាល់បញ្ហាដែលកើតមាននៅក្នុងផ្នែក។- មានសមត្ថភាពធ្វើរបាយការណ៍ទាក់ទងការងាររដ្ឋបាលផ្សេងៗ។- ធ្វើការងារមានភាពម៉ត់ចត់ ច្បាស់លាស់ និងធ្វើការងារដោយមានភាពជឿជាក់លើខ្លួនឯង។- មានទំនួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់ទៅលើការងារដែលខ្លួនបានធ្វើ។- ជួយសម្របសម្រួលការងារទូទៅដែលមាននៅក្នុងផ្នែកនៅពេលក្រុមការងារអវត្តមាន។- អាចធ្វើរបាយការណ៍សម្ភារចេញ និងចូលឃ្លាំងប្រចាំថ្ងៃ ប្រចាំខែ និងប្រចាំឆ្នាំបញ្ជូនទៅប្រធានផ្នែក។- ធ្វើរបាយការណ៍រាប់ស្តុកសម្ភារប្រចាំខែ។- ធ្វើរបាយការណ៍ឈប់សម្រាករបស់បុគ្គលិកប្រចាំខែ។- មានភាពបត់បែន និងអាចកត់ត្រារាល់ព័ត៌មានសំខាន់ៗបានលឿន និងទាន់ពេល។- អាចឆ្លើយតបការងារមួយចំនួនជាមួយផ្នែកដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធជំនួសឱ្យប្រធានផ្នែកបាន។- បង្កើតនៅគំនិតថ្មីៗដែលធ្វើឱ្យដំណើរការការងារនៅក្នុងផ្នែកឱ្យដំណើរកាន់តែល្អប្រសើរ។- រៀបចំទុកដាក់សម្ភារដែលមាននៅក្នុងឃ្លាំងឱ្យបានត្រឹមត្រូវ កុំឱ្យមានការបាក់បែក ឬបាត់បង់ ហើយធ្វើរបាយការណ៍បញ្ជូនទៅប្រធានផ្នែក។- សហការជាមួយក្រុមការងារនៅពេលមានការរៀបចំសម្ភារ។- រក្សាឱ្យបាននូវចំណងមិត្តភាព និងទំនាក់ទំនងល្អជាមួយក្រុមការងារទាំងអស់នៅក្នុងក្រុមហ៊ុន។
Job Requirement: - ធ្លាប់មានបទពិសោធន៍ជាមួយការងារឃ្លាំងមួយឆ្នាំឡើងទៅ។- ចេះប្រើប្រាស់កម្មវិធី Ms Word, Excel, PowerPoint ,Email បានស្ទាត់ជំនាញ។- មានជំនាញក្នុងការដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាផ្សេងៗ។- មានចំណេះដឹងអាចប្រើប្រាស់ ភាសារខ្មែរ និងភាសារអង់គ្លេសបាន។
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   012 797 939 hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh Phnom Penh Building #223 & 227, Mao Tse Tong Blvd., Sangkat Toul Svay Prey I, Khan Boeng Keng Kang, Phnom Penh 012 797 939

Job Description:
・	Support residents with any inquiries related to rules and regulations in Borey.
・	Deal closely with the residents to receive their constructive feedback and deal with their complaints related to safety, security and cleanliness…etc.
・	Ensure all safety measures are maintained with securities in Borey during daily operation basis
・	Oversea and manage the security and cleaner in the Borey
・	Report to property manager with the day-to-day operations and residents’ relations through the coordination of resident’s requests and administration of maintenance services
・	Carry out regular inspections in the Borey and report any issues or abnormalities to the Property Manager
・	Facilitate and solve problem related to property management service including the repair and maintenance warranty service to units under warranty
・	Billing/receiving of management fees
・	Perform other related duties as required.
Job Requirement:
* The applicant should ideally:
•	Fresh graduated is encourage to apply
•	Male, with no work experience or property related work experience preferential 
•	Good appearance and personal presentation  
•	Good English 
•	Good Microsoft Word and Excel skills

* BENEFITS:
•	$300
•	Seniority payment 
•	Meal allowance 
•	Quarter bonus
•	Khmer new year and Pchum Ben bonus
•	Annual leaves, sick leaves, special leaves 
•	Training and development 
•	Opportunities for promotion 
•	NSSF and Work accident insurance
•	Other
Company Profile: C-Herald Property Service is a global leading property management company which was established as a joint venture company in 2017. Since its establishment, C-herald has introduced Phnom Penh City with the new concept of Japanese Property management and a rigorous service spirit. It combines the rich management experiences and management model of the international market with the local national culture and develop a management service model that meets local needs. The successful model of the country has crossed the international map of the ASEAN. To promote the spirit of service with a high degree of trust in Japan. Base in Japan’s advanced business philosophy, management model and high-quality services, it still maintains its leading position in the industry. Take care of every customer and every owner with professional spirit, innovative thinking, and excellent services. Our vision is to become the recognized, respected and successful property management organization in Cambodia.

Job Description: • Manage the month-end and year-end close process, including the review of journal entries, account reconciliations, and supporting schedules. • Perform financial statement analyses and work closely with business partners to explain fluctuations to support business decisions. • Lead accounting projects, including the design and implementation of key finance systems, internal controls, global close efficiency, audit readiness, and management reporting. • Support business leaders in completing special projects, ad-hoc reporting, and strategic analysis as requested. • Financial Report and Audit Report. • Mentor, teach, and review the work of other members of the accounting team. • Control daily cash count. • Prepares and records asset, liability, revenue, and expenses entries by compiling and analyzing account information. • Maintains and balances subsidiary accounts by verifying, allocating, posting, reconciling transactions; resolving discrepancies. • Maintains general ledger by transferring subsidiary accounts; preparing a trial balance; reconciling entries. • Summarizes financial status by collecting information; preparing balance sheet, profit and loss, and other statements. • Produces payroll by initiating computer processing; printing checks, verifying finished product. Completes external audit by analyzing and scheduling general ledger accounts; providing information for auditors.
Job Requirement: 1. Bachelor degree in Finance and Accounting or related field 2. Minimum of 3 years' relevant experience in a Managerial Account 3. Familiar with accounting system4. Experience in Tax Declaration is a must 5. Good communication skills both verbal and written 6. Good negotiation skills, interpersonal skills 7. Good interpersonal skills with the ability to sustain effective relations internally and externally at all levels of a large organization

Job Description: -Facilitate the organization of meetings by scheduling the meeting, -inviting participants. ordering refreshments, booking equipment and meeting rooms, preparing and distributing agendas and taking minutes, and greeting visitors so that meetings are efficiently and effectively organized; Ensure meetings are both regular, -which can be scheduled well in advance, responding to urgent requests for support, Ensure the meetings are organized efficiently and to the satisfaction of the BOD; -Support to the BOD in preparation for board committee meetings and other formal meetings; Organize and facilitate guests according to the instructions of BOD; -Manage smoothest flow of document submission for approval; • Arrange and attend meeting. Company visit, Lunch and Dinner with guest as required; • Manage travels of the boss such as air ticket, hotel booking, car rental, budget planning. trip schedule, expenses clearing and documents preparation; -Manage company and personal confidential data (soft and hard copies); -Check the monthly payroll for employees; Deliver messages from Top management down to all related persons and ensure for the returned quick response. • Perform other tasks as required
Job Requirement: -A bachelor degree with a major in business or Admin; -At least 3 years of relevant secretarial experience to Top management companies: -Good communication skills and the ability to work with people are essential; -Strong planning skills, leader ship skills and pay attention to details; -Great negotiator, good interpersonal skills, caring and a good listener; • Fluent spoken and written English and able to conduct presentation with high confidence.

Job Description: •Serving as a liaison between upper management and technical staff to ensure project goals are met by all parties involved•Developing policies and procedures for the department based on industry best practices, relevant legislation, and input from staff members•Develop technical aspects of the company’s strategy to ensure alignment with its business goals•Provide IT strategic planning and direction for the IT roadmap•Develop people through coaching and mentoring•Discover and implement new technologies that yield competitive advantage•Help departments use technology profitably•Ensure quality assurance and data protection including intangible assets management are considered in processes•Safeguard the intellectual property, prevent security breaches, and keep client information confidential•Monitor KPIs and R&D budgets to assess technological performance•Keep abreast of new trends and best practices in the technology landscape•Communicate technology strategy to both internal and external stakeholders•Work closely with stakeholders to inform necessary improvements and adjustments to technology
Job Requirement: •Bachelor’s Degree in computer science or a related field; MBA or other relevant graduate degree is a plus•Knowledge of technological trends to build strategy, good knowledge on Electrification, Robotics, AI, DA, Cyber is a plus•Understanding of budgets and business-planning•Ability to conduct technological analyses and research•Strong communication skills•Strong interpersonal and stakeholder management skills•Excellent Leadership and organizational abilities•Strategic thinking•Problem-solving aptitude

Job Description: • Preparing schedule or project timeline for construction projects, coordinating and monitoring the work breakdowns of project implementations;• Checking the drawing of Consultants or internal architects to minimize error in drawings before construction works;• Monitoring work compliances of Contractors/Sub-Contractors to the drawing standards and specifications, and performing inspections of QA/QC and site safety practices;• Assisting in controlling BOQ, budgeting, project scheduling and subordinates’ performances mainly the architects, engineers and site labors;• Cooperating and communicating with MEP Manager, Construction Manager, Site Manager, Consultants, Contractors/Sub-Contractors and other project participants to provide assistances;• Performing some simple quantity surveying works and producing some simple drawings;• Monitoring Contractor’s site safety performance when conducting site spot-check and reporting to Contractor’s safety officer if found something not complied;• Monitoring concrete test results for each casting• Reviewing, collecting, summarizing and reporting the weekly status of project implementations to CCO regularly;• Performing other tasks as assigned by Management
Job Requirement: • Bachelor’s degree in Civil Engineering;• Minimum 5 years of work experiences in construction and project implementations;• Strong project management skill particularly the construction projects;• Positive thinking, dynamic teamwork, self-motivation, time management, disciplinary, respectful, helpful, supportive, communicative, cooperative and result-oriented;• Computer literacy in Microsoft Office (Word, Excel and PowerPoint), AutoCad and MS Project;• Khmer and English are acceptable;• Mobile from Office to site when necessary;** Salary and Benefits• Salary: competitive salary, which is negotiable, based on experiences and work duration;• Salary increment annually;• Annual staff party and random parties based on public calendar ceremonies;• Internal and external trainings of both soft and hard skills;• Privileged for special prices for house loan;• Pays of National Social Security Fund and Seniority;

Job Description: •To carry out all audit strategy & action plan to ensure compliance overall bank policy, procedure, guideline, manual and banking activities while support the business growth.•To assist HIA perform risk assessment exercise and develop Annual Audit Plan and ensure the audit assignments are completed in according to the plan. •To supervise & lead internal complete plan & ad-hoc audit assignment directed by HIA within mandate, professional standard, quality and expectation of Audit Committee.•Prepare & review independently, professionally, objectively all audit report for approval by HIA & Audit Committee. Chair exit meeting, discuss & ensure all audit reports are issued with all recommendations agreed by audited department/branch.•Assist HIA to direct, counsel and assign audit assignment to subordinates and review their work for sufficiency of scope, relevance and reliability.•Develop, enhance and update risk-based audit programs and departmental operational manual to be used as standard guidelines of auditing.•Provide value-added audit service and work closely with HODs across the Bank to identify area for efficiency improvement in achieving overall Bank’s business goal.•Assist in reviewing newly drafted policies and procedures for adequacy of controls and efficiency, for all business or operations functions.•Staying abreast of corporate governance, industry trends, new guidelines, policies, rules & regulations and advise the business unit/department accordingly with consultation from HIA.
Job Requirement: Formal Education:•Degree holder and preferably in Finance, Accounting, Banking or related field. Preferred level of Experience (by years/function/industry):•5 years of audit related working experience.•At least 1 year managerial level in audit/compliance/risk and preferably in banking.Other skills required:•Knowledge of internal control principles / practices, banking activities, risk management, corporate governance and statutory regulations.•Coaching & people management skill•Analytical, problem solving & decision making skill•Planning & organizing skillNegotiation, communication & presentation skill

Job Description: • មានអាយុចាប់ពី 23ឆ្នាំ ដល់ 36ឆ្នាំ• ជួយកំណត់គោលដៅ និងគោលបំណងនៃធនធានមនុស្ស ដើម្បីឆ្លុះបញ្ចាំងពីតម្រូវការពិតប្រាកដរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន• ផ្តួចផ្តើម និងជំរុញរបៀបវារៈធនធានមនុស្សសម្រាប់ផ្នែកអាជីវកម្មជាក់លាក់ ដើម្បីគាំទ្រដល់ប្រតិបត្តិការ• មានជំនាញសរសេរ និងវាយអក្សរបានល្អជាភាសាខ្មែរ និងអង់គ្លេស• ទទួលខុសត្រូវចំពោះទំនាក់ទំនងបុគ្គលិក ជម្លោះផ្ទៃក្នុង • ការងារផ្សេងទៀតដែលត្រូវបានចាត់តាំងដោយអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងថ្នាក់លើ
Job Requirement: - មានការអភិវឌ្ឍន៍ និងការអនុវត្តគំនិតផ្តួចផ្តើមធនធានមនុស្ស។- ជួយក្នុងការគ្រប់គ្រងការអនុវត្ត- រៀបចំដំណើរការជ្រើសរើសបុគ្គលិក (ផ្សព្វផ្សាយ និងសម្ភាសន៍)- រៀបចំឯកសារពាក់ព័ន្ធ និងធ្វើការតម្រង់ទិសម្រាប់បុគ្គលិកថ្មី- ផ្តល់ការប្រឹក្សាអំពីគោលនយោបាយ និងនីតិវិធី- ធានាឱ្យមានការកត់ត្រាត្រឹមត្រូវ នៃព័ត៌មានបុគ្គលិក- មានការទទួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់ មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ អត់ធ្មត់ ខិតខំព្យាយាម និងរហ័សរហួន- អាចប្រើប្រាស់កុំព្យូទ័រក្នុងបរិបទការងារបាន ជាពិសេស Microsoft Word & Excel- ត្រូវជំនួយដល់ប្រធានផ្នែករៀបចំសេចក្ដីប្រកាសព័ត៌មាននិងផ្សព្វផ្សាយបានទាន់ពេលនិងលឿនបំផុត។- ត្រូវដើរត្រួតពិនិត្យអគារនិងធ្វើរបាយការណ៍ជូនប្រធានផ្នែកបានយ៉ាងលឿននិងច្បាស់បំផុត ហើយទាន់ពេល។- ត្រូវរៀបចំនិងមើលការខុសត្រូវផ្នែកទំនុកបម្រុងសម្ភារៈការិយាល័យដល់បុគ្គលិកទាំងអស់ជាប្រចាំខែ និងពេលមានតម្រូវការ នឹង គ្រប់គ្រងឯកសណ្ឋានបុគ្គលិក។- ត្រូវរៀបចំ តាមដាន និង ធ្វើរបាយការណ៍វត្តមានបុគ្គលិកទាំងអស់ធ្វើជារបាយការណ៍ប្រចាំខែជូនថ្នាក់លើ- ត្រូវរៀបចំរបាយការណ៍ផ្នែក ធនធានមនុស្សនិងរដ្ខបាលដល់ប្រធានជាប្រចាំថ្ងៃ សប្ដាហ៍និងខែ។

Job Description:
•	Involve in setting sale target for the team.
•	Meet and exceed the set targets
•	Check and follow-up sales activities and sale plans.
•	Monitors competition by gathering current marketplace information on pricing, new products, promotion techniques, etc.
•	Focuses sales efforts by studying existing and potential volume of customers to increase our share in the market. 
•	Resolves customer complaints by investigating problems; developing solutions; preparing reports; marketing recommendation to management.
•	Educate sales team by establishing programs/seminars in the areas of new account sales and growth.
•	Manage the quality customer portfolio, maintain accurate records, and always follow the company’s policies and compliance procedures. 
•	Perform other duties as assigned from the management team
Job Requirement:
•	Minimum Bachelor degree or lower degree accepted if  at least 3 years’ experience in similar positions
•	Computer literacy and English language proficiency (Chinese language is a plus)
•	Good knowledge of communication skill and customer focus.
•	Strong time management and result oriented.
•	Outgoing personality, confidence, hard working with positive attitude and ability to work under pressure. 
•	Desire to go extra and beyond responsibilities
•	Discretion and Dedication

Job Description:
• បង្រៀនសិស្សថ្នាក់មត្តយេ្យ/បឋមចំណេះទូទៅខ្មែរ។
• រៀបចំ និងផលិតសម្ភារៈសម្រាប់បម្រើឳ្យការបង្រៀន និងរៀន។
• រៀបចំមេរៀន កិច្ចការសម្រាប់សិស្ស កិច្ចការផ្ទះ កែ និងប្រគល់ឳ្យសិស្សជាប្រចាំ។
• កត់ត្រា និងកត់ចំណំាអវត្តមានសិស្ស ការសិក្សា និងចំណុចពិសេសផ្សេងៗទៀត។
• បំពេញការងាររដ្ឋបាលគ្រូ។
•​ បង្រៀនសិស្សតាមកាលវិភាគដែលសាលាកំណត់
• ចូលរួមកិច្ចប្រជុំតាមការស្នើសុំរបស់សាលា
• រៀបចំកិច្ចតែងការបង្រៀនស្របតាមកម្មវិធីរបស់ក្រសួងអប់រំ　យុវជននិងកីឡា
• ទំនាក់ទំនងជាមួយអាណាព្យបាលទាក់ទងទៅនឹងការសិក្សារបស់សិស្ស។
Job Requirement:
• ជានិស្សិតឆ្នាំទី២ ឡើងទៅ
• មានសញ្ញាបត្រគរុកោសល្យផ្នែកបង្រៀន (កាន់តែប្រសើ)
• អទិភាពចំពោះអ្នកមានបទពិសោធន៏បង្រៀន (មិនមានបទពិសោធន៏ក៏អាចដាក់ពាក្យបានដែរ)
• មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ ចេះអត់ធ្មត់ ចេះជួយគ្នា និងចេះចែករំលែក។
• មានភាពរួសរាយរាក់ទាក់ និងចូលចិត្តបំពេញកិច្ចការជាមួយក្មេងៗ។
• អាចបំពេញកិច្ចការក្រោមសម្ពាធនានា។
• យកចិត្តទុកដាក់ក្នុងការបំពេញកិច្ចការ ចេះបត់បែន និងមានទំនួលខុសត្រូវការងារខ្ពស់។
• ស្រលាញ់ចូលចិត្តការងារបង្រៀន គោរពពេលវេលាធ្វើការ និងអាចបំពេញកិច្ចការជាក្រុម។
• សកម្មក្នុងការងារ និងរាល់សកម្មភាពផ្សេងៗ
• ចេះកម្មវិធីកុំព្យូទ័រ Microsoft Excel​​ and Word
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   Telegram : 015 94 06 70 / 017 231 007 narith017@gmail.com ✍️ទំនាក់ទំនងអាស័យដ្ឋាន ផ្ទះលេខ 35-37 ផ្លូវ582 សង្កាត់បឹងកក់២ ខណ្ឌទួលគោក រាជធានីភ្នំពេញ នៅខាងជើងផ្សារទួលគោក ចំងាយ 50 ម៉ែត្រ ។ Telegram : 015 94 06 70 / 017 231 007

Job Description:
• Organize and lead activities designed to promote physical, mental and social development
• Teach basic skills such as color, shape, number and letter recognition, personal hygiene, and social skills
• Observe and evaluate children's performance, behavior, social development, and physical health
• Provide a variety of materials and resources for children to explore, manipulate and use
• Assimilate arriving children to the school environment by greeting them, helping them remove outerwear, and selecting activities of interest to them
• Prepare materials and classrooms for class activities;
Job Requirement:
• At least One-year experience in teaching Chinese
• One year work-related experience in education
• Good command of Chinese
• Computer literacy: Ms. Word, Ms. Excel a plus
• Good communication, interpersonal, and customer-service skill

Job Description: The main purpose of the "officer, employee relation and engagement" position is responsible for fulfilling required legal document or task such as health checkup, Cambodian Employment Card, Work Permit, Staff Movement in out, OT request and renew shop stewards to comply with MLVT.LocationHead Office, Phnom PenhDuties and Responsibilities. Work closely with relevant person to fulfill required legal . documents (Health checkup, Cambodian Employment Card, work permit…) and make sure it’s up to date.. Prepare documents such as staff movement in/out, OT request and submit to MoLVT through paper or LACMS.. Facilitate, coordinate in preparing and submission of the renewal labor requirement such as shop steward to comply with labor law.. Coordinate, assist in work permit registration for expatriate staff and its renewal as needed.. Perform orientation induction program for newcomer by working closely with Learning & Development department as well as Talent Acquisition Department . Keep tracking an exit Interview to improve employee engagement. Build a positive attitude and promote entrepreneurial spirit and good work environment to enhance employee Engagement. Support the successful execution of employee rewards and recognition. Other tasks assigned by Manager.
Job Requirement: .Bachelor Degree in Human Resource Management, Law or relevant field..Minimum of 1-year experience in the role..Good communication skills, and problem solving..Ability to multi-task and work independently..Be knowledgeable of labor laws and regulations.Be able to negotiate and lead teams..Be self-motivated, persistent and diligent..Be trustworthy, intuitive, organized..Computer literacy in MS Office..Be able to communicate in English such as writing, listening and speaking.
Company Profile:
Hattha Bank is a leading bank in Cambodia, licensed by National Bank of Cambodia. Having been operating for more than 26 years with MDI status in the market, with its rapidly success, Hattha Bank has transformed its status from MDI to commercial bank in 2020, and continue providing diversified financial services to individual and SME businesses; and jump into retail consumer financial market and corporate customer in urbanities.

Hattha Bank is a subsidiary of Bank of Ayudhya (Krungsri), the fifth largest commercial bank in Thailand, and a member of MUFG Bank, the Japan’s largest banking group, and one of the largest and most diversified financial groups in the world.

Job Description: •	Involve in setting sale target for the team.•	Meet and exceed the set targets•	Check and follow-up sales activities and sale plans.•	Monitors competition by gathering current marketplace information on pricing, new products, promotion techniques, etc.•	Focuses sales efforts by studying existing and potential volume of customers to increase our share in the market. •	Resolves customer complaints by investigating problems; developing solutions; preparing reports; marketing recommendation to management.•	Educate sales team by establishing programs/seminars in the areas of new account sales and growth.•	Manage the quality customer portfolio, maintain accurate records, and always follow the company’s policies and compliance procedures. •	Perform other duties as assigned from the management team
Job Requirement: •	Minimum Bachelor degree or lower degree accepted if  at least 3 years’ experience in similar positions•	Computer literacy and English language proficiency (Chinese language is a plus)•	Good knowledge of communication skill and customer focus.•	Strong time management and result oriented.•	Outgoing personality, confidence, hard working with positive attitude and ability to work under pressure. •	Desire to go extra and beyond responsibilities•	Discretion and Dedication

job title: មន្ត្រីប្រតិបត្តិការសាខា - ០១ នាក់
position: មន្ត្រីប្រតិបត្តិការសាខា - ០១ នាក់
Job Description: ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើការគ្រប់គ្រងប្រតិបត្តិការសាច់ប្រាក់, រៀបចំបញ្ជីប្រតិបត្តិការសាច់ប្រាក់ប្រចាំថ្ងៃ, រៀបចំរបាយការណ៍ ប័ណ្ណដាក់/ដកប្រាក់ ផ្ញើទៅកាន់ប្រធានផ្នែកប្រតិបត្តិការ, បិទគណនីសន្សំសំចៃ, បោះពុម្ពរបាយការណ៍ឲ្យបានទាន់ពេលវេលា និងបំពេញកិច្ចការផ្សេងៗតាមការចាត់តាំងរបស់ប្រធានផ្នែកប្រតិបត្តិការសាខា ឬនាយកសាខា។Location﻿﻿សាខាក្រុងប៉ោយប៉ែត-សង្កាត់ប៉ោយប៉ែត﻿Duties and Responsibilities. គ្រប់គ្រងសាច់ប្រាក់ទៅក្នុងប្រអប់BOO និងក្នុង Till របស់ខ្លួនអោយបានត្រឹមត្រូវ។. រៀបចំប្រតិបត្តិការសាច់ប្រាក់នីមួយៗក្នុងថ្ងៃ អោយបានទាន់ពេlវេលា និងត្រឹមត្រូវ។. រៀបចំបញ្ជីប្រតិបត្តិការសាច់ប្រាក់ប្រចាំថ្ងៃ និងផ្ទៀងផ្ទាត់ជាក់ស្តែង ឲ្យបានត្រឹមត្រូវ និងទាន់ពេលវេលា។. រៀបចំរបាយការណ៍ ប័ណ្ណដាក់/ដកប្រាក់ និងផ្ញើទៅកាន់ប្រធានផ្នែកប្រតិបត្តិការ។បិទគណនីសន្សំសំចៃ។. បោះពុម្ពរបាយការណ៍ឲ្យបានទាន់ពេលវេលា និងត្រឹមត្រូវ។. បំពេញកិច្ចការផ្សេងៗតាមការចាត់តាំងរបស់ប្រធានផ្នែកប្រតិបត្តិការសាខា ឬនាយកសាខា ឬថ្នាក់គ្រប់គ្រងដែលមានសមត្ថកិច្ច។
Job Requirement: . បញ្ចប់ថ្នាក់បរិញ្ញាបត្រ ឬជានិស្សិតឆ្នាំទី៤ ផ្នែកគ្រប់គ្រងពាណិជ្ជកម្ម ឬធនាគារ និងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ ឬសញ្ញាបត្រដែលមានតម្លៃស្មើ។. មានអត្តចរិកល្អ មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ ម៉ឺងម៉ាត់ សុភាពរាបសារ និងមានឆន្ទ:ក្នុងការធ្វើការងារ។. មានចំណេះដឹងភាសាអង់គ្លេស និងកុំព្យូទ័រ Ms. Office (Ms. Word & Excel) Internet & Email។
Company Profile:
Hattha Bank is a leading bank in Cambodia, licensed by National Bank of Cambodia. Having been operating for more than 26 years with MDI status in the market, with its rapidly success, Hattha Bank has transformed its status from MDI to commercial bank in 2020, and continue providing diversified financial services to individual and SME businesses; and jump into retail consumer financial market and corporate customer in urbanities.

Hattha Bank is a subsidiary of Bank of Ayudhya (Krungsri), the fifth largest commercial bank in Thailand, and a member of MUFG Bank, the Japan’s largest banking group, and one of the largest and most diversified financial groups in the world.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   069 222 800 – 086 354 354 career@hatthabank.com Phnom Penh អគារលេខ៦០៦ ផ្លូវលេខ២៧១ សង្កាត់បឹងទំពុន១ ខណ្ឌមានជ័យ រាជធានីភ្នំពេញ 069 222 800 – 086 354 354

job title: មន្ត្រីសេវាកម្មសាខា - ០១ នាក់
position: មន្ត្រីសេវាកម្មសាខា - ០១ នាក់
Job Description: កំណត់អំពីភារកិច្ច និងការទទួលខុសត្រូវក្នុងការធ្វើការផ្សព្វផ្សាយ និងផ្តល់ព័ត៌មានជូនអតិថិជនអោយបានល្អ ត្រួតពិនិត្យ និងរក្សាទុកឯកសារបុគ្គលិក, ឥណទាន, គណនីសន្សំសំចៃ, ឯកសារទ្រព្យធានា និងឯកសារផ្សេងៗទៀតអោយបានត្រឹមត្រូវ រៀបចំភ្ជាប់/ផ្អាក/បិទ កាតអេធីអឹម ប្រព័ន្ធធនាគារចល័ត និងសេវាកម្មហិរញ្ញវត្ថុផ្សេងទៀត រៀបចំរបាយការណ៍ប្រចាំថ្ងៃ រៀបចំចលនាបុគ្គលិក បញ្ជូនសៀវភៅការងារ ជ្រើសរើសប្រតិភូបុគ្គលិក សម្របសម្រួលការបណ្តុះបណ្តាល និងការវាយតម្លៃ បុគ្គលិកសាខា គ្រប់គ្រងស្ដុក គ្រប់គ្រងនិងថែទាំទ្រព្យ និងដឹកបញ្ជូន និងបំពេញកិច្ចការផ្សេងៗតាមការចាត់តាំងរបស់ប្រធានផ្នែកប្រតិបត្តិការសាខាឬនាយកសាខា។Locationសាខាស្រុកម៉ាឡៃ-ឃុំម៉ាឡៃ﻿﻿Duties and Responsibilities. ធ្វើការផ្សព្វផ្សាយ និងផ្តល់ព័ត៌មានជូនអតិថិជនអោយបានល្អ។. បង្កើតលេខសម្គាល់អតិថិជន CIF, គណនីឥណទាន គណនីសន្សំសំចៃ និងគណនីបញ្ញើមានកាលកំណត់។. ត្រួតពិនិត្យ និងរក្សាទុកឯកសារបុគ្គលិក, ឥណទាន, គណនីសន្សំសំចៃ, ឯកសារទ្រព្យធានា និងឯកសារផ្សេងៗ។. រៀបចំភ្ជាប់/ផ្អាក/បិទ កាតអេធីអឹម ប្រព័ន្ធធនាគារចល័ត និងសេវាកម្មហិរញ្ញវត្ថុផ្សេងទៀត។. រៀបចំរបាយការណ៍ប្រចាំថ្ងៃ និងរៀបចំសំណើទិញ បញ្ជាទិញ និងទូទាត់ចំណាយ (ក្រោយមានការអនុម័តពីថ្នាក់គ្រប់គ្រងមានសមត្ថកិច្ច)។. រៀបចំចលនាបុគ្គលិក បញ្ជូនសៀវភៅការងារ ជ្រើសរើសប្រតិភូបុគ្គលិក សម្របសម្រួលការបណ្តុះបណ្តាល និងការវាយតម្លៃ បុគ្គលិកសាខា។. គ្រប់គ្រងស្ដុក គ្រប់គ្រងនិងថែទាំទ្រព្យ និងដឹកបញ្ជូន។បំពេញកិច្ចការផ្សេងៗតាមការចាត់តាំងរបស់ប្រធានផ្នែកប្រតិបត្តិការសាខាឬនាយកសាខា។
Job Requirement: . បញ្ចប់ថ្នាក់បរិញ្ញាបត្រ ឬជានិស្សិតឆ្នាំទី៤ ផ្នែកគ្រប់គ្រងពាណិជ្ជកម្ម ឬធនាគារ និងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ ឬសញ្ញាបត្រដែលមានតម្លៃស្មើ។. មានអត្តចរិកល្អ មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ ម៉ឺងម៉ាត់ សុភាពរាបសារ និងមានឆន្ទ:ក្នុងការធ្វើការងារ។. មានចំណេះដឹងភាសាអង់គ្លេស និងកុំព្យូទ័រ Ms. Office (Ms. Word & Excel) Internet & Email។. មានការប្រាស្រ័យទាក់ទងល្អ និង ជំនាញនៅក្នុងការចរចារ។
Company Profile:
Hattha Bank is a leading bank in Cambodia, licensed by National Bank of Cambodia. Having been operating for more than 26 years with MDI status in the market, with its rapidly success, Hattha Bank has transformed its status from MDI to commercial bank in 2020, and continue providing diversified financial services to individual and SME businesses; and jump into retail consumer financial market and corporate customer in urbanities.

Hattha Bank is a subsidiary of Bank of Ayudhya (Krungsri), the fifth largest commercial bank in Thailand, and a member of MUFG Bank, the Japan’s largest banking group, and one of the largest and most diversified financial groups in the world.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   069 222 800 – 086 354 354 career@hatthabank.com Phnom Penh អគារលេខ៦០៦ ផ្លូវលេខ២៧១ សង្កាត់បឹងទំពុន១ ខណ្ឌមានជ័យ រាជធានីភ្នំពេញ 069 222 800 – 086 354 354

Job Description: - Market research, analysis and evaluation of e-wallet products in domestic and abroad; competitors' products, to recommend existing product optimizations or to develop new products;- Receive and evaluate requests for products and services from departments and units in the company;- Design customer journey, product roadmap;- Develop product features, design interactive channels for products and services based on product journeys and roadmaps.- Build product manuals for end users, agents, merchants, payment acceptance points...- Develop a set of troubleshooting manuals for the customer care department.- Evaluate, analyze, document business/product requirements and translate into specific technical solutions"

Company Profile: eMoney stands for E-MONEY PAYMENT SOLUTIONS PLC., is the leading mobile finance service providers in Cambodia. This is a very huge, potential & developing field in today's industry revolution 4.0. Therefore, we  need a huge, enthusiastic and elite IT force (BA, SA, developer, tester...) to make sure a fast development as well as provide the best services to citizens throughout the country such as bank services (fund transfer, cash in/out, esaving, visa/master card (ecard)), cash in/out through agents, money transfer, ePayment, Online Payment, QR payment, a phone top up, a game top up, payroll service, eShop Service (purchase goods for foods without cash)... by phone and agents
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department HR Manager 0714428888 emoneyjob8@gmail.com Phnom Penh Building #199, Mao Tse Tung Blvd, Sangkat Tuol Svay Prey2, Khan Chamkamon, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 0714428888

Job Description: • Ensure that sale target as set per month is achieved• Build a strong relationship with customers• Prepare daily, weekly, and monthly sale report to supervisor or manager• Perform daily tasks of sales transaction• Manage and update accurate customer profile• Perform other duties as assigned from the management team
Job Requirement: • Minimum Bachelor degree or lower degree accepted if at least 2 years’ experience in similar positions• Computer literacy and English language proficiency (Chinese language is a plus)• Good knowledge of communication skill and customer focus.• Strong time management and result oriented.• Outgoing personality, confidence, hard working with positive attitude and ability to work under pressure.• Desire to go extra and beyond responsibilities• Discretion and Dedication

job title: មន្ត្រីផ្នែកប្រឹក្សាឥណទាន - ៤៣៧ នាក់
position: មន្ត្រីផ្នែកប្រឹក្សាឥណទាន - ៤៣៧ នាក់
Job Description: គោលបំណងសំខាន់ៗនៃតួនាទីជា “មន្ត្រីផ្នែកប្រឹក្សាឥណទាន” គឺកំណត់អំពីភារកិច្ច និងការទទួលខុសត្រូវក្នុងការចុះផ្សព្វផ្សាយអំពីផលិតផល សេវាកម្មរបស់ ធនាគារ ហត្ថា និងរៀបចំឯកសារបញ្ចេញឥណទានជូនអតិថិជន រួចតាមដាននិងប្រមូលឥណទានដែលយឺតយ៉ាវក្នុងការសងត្រឡប់។Locationរាជធានីភ្នំពេញ - ៩៧នាក់​ | ខេត្តបន្ទាយមានជ័យ - ០៩នាក់ | ខេត្តបាត់ដំបង - ២៣នាក់​​ | ខេត្ដកំពង់ចាម - ២៦នាក់ | ខេត្ដកំពង់ឆ្នាំង - ១១នាក់  | ខេត្តស្ទឹងត្រែង - ០៣នាក់ | ខេត្ដកោះកុង - ០៨នាក់​ | ខេត្ដកំពង់ធំ - ១៨នាក់ | ខេត្ដកំពត - ២០នាក់ | ខេត្ដកណ្ដាល - ៦២នាក់ | ខេត្ដក្រចេះ - ០៩នាក់ | ខេត្ដរតនគិរី - ០២នាក់ | ខេត្ដកំពង់ស្ពឺ - ១៤នាក់ | ខេត្ដព្រះសីហនុ - ១៣នាក់ | ខេត្ដព្រៃវែង - ៣៣នាក់ | ខេត្ដតាកែវ - ១១នាក់ |​ ខេត្ដត្បូងឃ្មុំ - ១៧នាក់ | ខេត្តកែប - ០៤នាក់ | ខេត្ដពោធិ៍សាត់ - ២០នាក់ | ខេត្ដសៀមរាប - ១៧នាក់ | ខេត្ដស្វាយរៀង - ០៩នាក់ | ខេត្ដឧត្ដរមានជ័យ - ០៦នាក់ | ខេត្តមណ្ឌលគិរី - ០២នាក់ | ខេត្តព្រះវិហារ - ០៣នាក់Duties and Responsibilities. ធ្វើការផ្សព្វផ្សាយអំពី ផលិតផល សេវាកម្ម របស់ ធនាគារ ហត្ថា ដើម្បីពង្រីកទីផ្សារ និងទាក់ទាញអតិថិជនសក្តានុពល។. ធ្វើការប្រឹក្សា និងពិគ្រោះយោបល់ ជាមួយអតិថិជន ដើម្បីជាដំណោះស្រាយផ្នែកហិរញ្ញវត្ថុជូនអតិថិជន។. រៀបចំឯកសារឥណទាន ប្រមូលព័ត៌មាន វាយតម្លៃឥណទានជូនអតិថិជន តាមដាននិងដោះស្រាយនៃការសងត្រលប់របស់អតិថិជន។. រៀបចំផែនការសកម្មភាពដើម្បីឲ្យសម្រេចតាមផែនការសូចនករទាំងប្រចាំខែ ប្រចាំឆ្នាំរបស់ខ្លួន។. អនុវត្តតាមលំហូរការងារឥណទាន និងតាមសេចក្តីសម្រេចដែលមានសុពលភាពឲ្យមានប្រសិទ្ធភាព។. បំពេញការងារផ្សេងៗតាមការចាត់តាំងរបស់ប្រធានផ្នែកប្រឹក្សាឥណទាន និងនាយកសាខា។
Job Requirement: . ជាប់បាក់ឌុប ឬកំពុងសិក្សាថ្នាក់បរិញ្ញាបត្ររង ឬបរិញ្ញាបត្រលើគ្រប់ជំនាញ។. មានបទពិសោធន៍ផ្នែកលក់ ឬការផ្សព្វផ្សាយកាន់តែល្អប្រសើរ។. មានអត្តចរិកល្អ មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ ម៉ឹងម៉ាត់ សុភាពរាបសារ រួសរាយរាក់ទាក់និងមានឆន្ទៈក្នុងការធ្វើការងារ។. មានប្រវត្តិរស់នៅក្នុងសហគមន៍ល្អ ត្រូវមានម៉ូតូផ្ទាល់ខ្លួននិងអាចបើកបរបាន។. ផ្នែកគណិតវិទ្យាអាចវិភាគ គណនា និងយល់ដឹងពីផ្នែកទីផ្សារ។
Company Profile:
Hattha Bank is a leading bank in Cambodia, licensed by National Bank of Cambodia. Having been operating for more than 26 years with MDI status in the market, with its rapidly success, Hattha Bank has transformed its status from MDI to commercial bank in 2020, and continue providing diversified financial services to individual and SME businesses; and jump into retail consumer financial market and corporate customer in urbanities.

Hattha Bank is a subsidiary of Bank of Ayudhya (Krungsri), the fifth largest commercial bank in Thailand, and a member of MUFG Bank, the Japan’s largest banking group, and one of the largest and most diversified financial groups in the world.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   069 222 800 – 086 354 354 career@hatthabank.com Phnom Penh អគារលេខ៦០៦ ផ្លូវលេខ២៧១ សង្កាត់បឹងទំពុន១ ខណ្ឌមានជ័យ រាជធានីភ្នំពេញ 069 222 800 – 086 354 354

job title: Sales Executive ( ចុះលក់តាមខេត្ត )
position: Sales Executive ( ចុះលក់តាមខេត្ត )
Job Description: • Ensure that sale target as set per month is achieved• Build a strong relationship with customers• Prepare daily, weekly, and monthly sale report to supervisor or manager• Perform daily tasks of sales transaction• Manage and update accurate customer profile• Perform other duties as assigned from the management team
Job Requirement: • Minimum Bachelor degree or lower degree accepted if at least 2 years’ experience in similar positions• Computer literacy and English language proficiency (Chinese language is a plus)• Good knowledge of communication skill and customer focus.• Strong time management and result oriented.• Outgoing personality, confidence, hard working with positive attitude and ability to work under pressure.• Desire to go extra and beyond responsibilities• Discretion and Dedication
Company Profile: KONG NUON GROUP is well known for tire’s product through product durability and high brand image. To develop and expend operation in Cambodia, We are seeking dynamic candidate to fill position as
Contact Info: Contact Information Chea Puthdavann HR Manager 081 78 79 80 / 078 888 910 kng.hr@kongnuongroup.com Phnom Penh #220, St 182, Sangkat Phsar Depo I, Khan Toul Kork, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 081 78 79 80 / 078 888 910

job title: មន្ត្រីផ្នែកលក់ - ៨៧ នាក់
position: មន្ត្រីផ្នែកលក់ - ៨៧ នាក់
Job Description: គោលបំណងសំខាន់ៗនៃតួនាទីជា “មន្ត្រីផ្នែកផ្នែកលក់” គឺកំណត់អំពីភារកិច្ច និងការទទួលខុសត្រូវក្នុងការចុះផ្សព្វផ្សាយពីផលិតផល សេវាកម្មរបស់ ធនាគារ ហត្ថា និងចុះជួបទំនាក់ទំនងអតិថិជនដោយផ្ទាល់ និងពន្យល់អំពីសេវាកម្ម-ផលិតផលប្រាក់បញ្ញើសន្សំជូនដល់អតិថិជន និងរៀបចំឯកសារបើកគណនីជូនអតិថិជនដែលមានបំណងដាក់ប្រាក់សន្សំជាមួយធនាគារ ហត្ថា និងចូលរូមដោះស្រាយនូវរាល់បញ្ហាដែលនឹងកើតមានឡើងចំពោះប្រតិបត្ដិការសេវាប្រាក់សន្សំ។Locationរាជធានីភ្នំពេញ - ០៣នាក់​ |​ ខេត្ដកណ្ដាល - ១៤នាក់ | ខេត្ដកែប - ០១នាក់ | ខេត្តបាត់ដំបង - ០៨នាក់ | ខេត្តកំពង់ស្ពឺ - ០២នាក់ | ខេត្តមណ្ឌលគិរី - ០១នាក់ | ខេត្តព្រៃវែង - ០៥នាក់ | ខេត្ដពោធិ៍សាត់ - ០៤នាក់ | ខេត្ដកំពង់ធំ - ០៦នាក់ | ខេត្ដកោះកុង - ០១នាក់ | ខេត្តកំពង់ចាម - ០៤នាក់ | ខេត្តកំពត - ០១នាក់ | ខេត្តឧត្តរមានជ័យ - ០២នាក់ | ខេត្ដសៀមរាប - ០៧នាក់ | ខេត្ដតាកែវ - ០៥នាក់ | ខេត្ដបន្ទាយមានជ័យ - ០៧នាក់ | ខេត្តកំពង់ឆ្នាំង - ០១នាក់ | ខេត្តក្រចេះ - ០២នាក់ | ខេត្តបៃលិន - ០១នាក់ | ខេត្តរតនគិរី - ០១នាក់ | ខេត្តត្បូងឃ្មុំ - ០៣នាក់ | ខេត្តព្រះវិហារ - ០២នាក់ | ខេត្តស្ទឹងត្រែង - ០១នាក់ | ខេត្តព្រះសីហនុ - ០២នាក់ | ខេត្តស្វាយរៀង - ០៣នាក់Duties and Responsibilities. ចូលរួមក្នុងយុទ្ធនាការ ផ្សព្វផ្សាយផ្សេងៗទាក់ទងនឹងផលិតផល សេវាកម្ម របស់ធនាគារ ហត្ថា។. ចុះជួបទំនាក់ទំនងអតិថិជន និងសាធារណជនដោយផ្ទាល់នឹងពន្យល់អំពី ផលិតផល សេវាកម្ម របស់ធនាគារ ហត្ថា។. ធ្វើការដោះស្រាយនូវរាល់បញ្ហាដែលនឹងអាចកើតមានឡើងចំពោះ ប្រតិបត្តិការ។. រៀបចំ និងគ្រប់គ្រងរាល់ឯកសារព័ត៌មានដែលទាក់ទងជាមួយអតិថិជន។. រាយការណ៍ពីបាតុភាព និងផលប៉ះពាល់ដល់ ផលិតផល និងសេវាកម្ម ទាំងឡាយមកគណៈគ្រប់គ្រង ឱ្យបានទាន់ពេល និងត្រឹមត្រូវ។. រៀបចំរបាយការណ៍តាមការចាត់ចែងរបស់គណៈគ្រប់គ្រង។
Job Requirement: . កំពុងសិក្សា ឬបញ្ចប់ថ្នាក់បរិញ្ញាបត្រ ជំនាញទីផ្សារ ឬជំនាញដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធ។. មានបទពិសោធន៍ផ្នែកលក់ ឬការផ្សព្វផ្សាយកាន់តែល្អប្រសើរ។. មានឆន្ទៈ ចុះបំពេញការងារនៅតាមមូលដ្ឋាន និងដែនគ្រប់គ្រងរបស់សាខា។. មានអត្តចរិតល្អ មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ សុភាពរាបសារ និងតស៊ូការធ្វើការងារ។. មានចំណេះដឹងផ្នែកភាសាអង់គ្លេស។. អាចប្រើប្រាស់កុំព្យូទ័រលើកម្មវិធី MS. Word និង MS. Excel ។. ត្រូវមានម៉ូតូផ្ទាល់ខ្លួន និងអាចបើកបរបាន។
Company Profile:
Hattha Bank is a leading bank in Cambodia, licensed by National Bank of Cambodia. Having been operating for more than 26 years with MDI status in the market, with its rapidly success, Hattha Bank has transformed its status from MDI to commercial bank in 2020, and continue providing diversified financial services to individual and SME businesses; and jump into retail consumer financial market and corporate customer in urbanities.

Hattha Bank is a subsidiary of Bank of Ayudhya (Krungsri), the fifth largest commercial bank in Thailand, and a member of MUFG Bank, the Japan’s largest banking group, and one of the largest and most diversified financial groups in the world.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   069 222 800 – 086 354 354 career@hatthabank.com Phnom Penh អគារលេខ៦០៦ ផ្លូវលេខ២៧១ សង្កាត់បឹងទំពុន១ ខណ្ឌមានជ័យ រាជធានីភ្នំពេញ 069 222 800 – 086 354 354

job title: Sales Executive ( ចុះលក់តាមខេត្ត )
position: Sales Executive ( ចុះលក់តាមខេត្ត )
Job Description: • Ensure that sale target as set per month is achieved• Build a strong relationship with customers• Prepare daily, weekly, and monthly sale report to supervisor or manager• Perform daily tasks of sales transaction• Manage and update accurate customer profile• Perform other duties as assigned from the management team
Job Requirement: • Minimum Bachelor degree or lower degree accepted if at least 2 years’ experience in similar positions• Computer literacy and English language proficiency (Chinese language is a plus)• Good knowledge of communication skill and customer focus.• Strong time management and result oriented.• Outgoing personality, confidence, hard working with positive attitude and ability to work under pressure.• Desire to go extra and beyond responsibilities• Discretion and Dedication
Company Profile: KONG NUON GROUP is well known for tire’s product through product durability and high brand image. To develop and expend operation in Cambodia, We are seeking dynamic candidate to fill position as
Contact Info: Contact Information Chea Puthdavann HR Manager 081 78 79 80 / 078 888 910 kng.hr@kongnuongroup.com Phnom Penh #220, St 182, Sangkat Phsar Depo I, Khan Toul Kork, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 081 78 79 80 / 078 888 910

job title: Sales Supervisor​​ ( ចុះលក់តាមខេត្ត ​)
position: Sales Supervisor​​ ( ចុះលក់តាមខេត្ត ​)
Job Description: •	Involve in setting sale target for the team.•	Meet and exceed the set targets•	Check and follow-up sales activities and sale plans.•	Monitors competition by gathering current marketplace information on pricing, new products, promotion techniques, etc.•	Focuses sales efforts by studying existing and potential volume of customers to increase our share in the market. •	Resolves customer complaints by investigating problems; developing solutions; preparing reports; marketing recommendation to management.•	Educate sales team by establishing programs/seminars in the areas of new account sales and growth.•	Manage the quality customer portfolio, maintain accurate records, and always follow the company’s policies and compliance procedures. •	Perform other duties as assigned from the management team
Job Requirement: •	Minimum Bachelor degree or lower degree accepted if  at least 3 years’ experience in similar positions•	Computer literacy and English language proficiency (Chinese language is a plus)•	Good knowledge of communication skill and customer focus.•	Strong time management and result oriented.•	Outgoing personality, confidence, hard working with positive attitude and ability to work under pressure. •	Desire to go extra and beyond responsibilities•	Discretion and Dedication
Company Profile: KONG NUON GROUP is well known for tire’s product through product durability and high brand image. To develop and expend operation in Cambodia, We are seeking dynamic candidate to fill position as
Contact Info: Contact Information Chea Puthdavann HR Manager 081 78 79 80 / 078 888 910 kng.hr@kongnuongroup.com Phnom Penh #220, St 182, Sangkat Phsar Depo I, Khan Toul Kork, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 081 78 79 80 / 078 888 910

Job Description:
Job responsibilities and duties:
Internal/External Interactions: 
• Closer relationship with dealership divisions of RMA Cambodia and other dealers and assets suppliers
• Planning and Daily visits new customers\
• More regular, planned, and structured visit to provincial customers 
• Joint Target to improve groups performance in sales, penetration, and profit
• Joint calls to large Target fleet customers
• Weekly meeting with Lending Manager/Senior Collection Officer/Senior Loan Recovery Officer about default customers and review previous months performance
• Weekly meeting with Lending Manager to review previous months performance
• Collect quality applicant rather than quantity by doing careful credit assessment for approval request
• Train and coach sales team of dealers about financing 
• Ensure the effective communication maintained among team and other departments
• Report and update to the Dealer sale team about the application status
• Find out key potential growth of sale and recommend this to management
• Support recovery team and collection team if needed 
• Manage and delegate tasks to lending coordinator 
• Attend trainings as required by the management
Job Requirement:
Job requirements and qualifications:
Education/Certification:
• Bachelor or Master degree in business management or related field
• At least two years of experience in the similar position
Knowledge, Skill, and Experience:
ESSENTIAL:
• Multi tasks and strong organizational skill
• Good in problem solving
• Analytical skills
OTHERS:
• Creative, result-driven, able to take initiative.
• Business Management Ethic
• Strong team player
• Good in problem solving
Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.
Contact Info: Contact Information Sothea Thannarith (Mr.)  070555494 recruitment.kh@rmagroup.net #27, St. 134, SangkatMittapheap, Khan 7 Makara, Phnom Penh 070555494

Job Description: 1.)	Keys Roles and Responsibilities1.	Maintains accounts payable functions such as reviewing and checking all invoices for appropriate documentation and posting to the accounting system with proper filling and maintaining of the record.2.	Check invoices and process all payment3.	Daily payment posting & petty cash into the excel and accounting system 4.	process accounts and incoming payments in compliance with financial policies and procedures etc5.	Perform day-to-day financial transactions, including verifying, classifying, and recording entries on excel and accounting system 6.	Reconcile the accounts payable ledger to ensure that all bills and payments are accounted for and properly posted.7.	Prepare payment voucher, cash Advance statement, summary expense report, and reconcile inventory listing, etc8.	File the accounting documents and keep them in a proper and safe place9.	Provides timely and accurate payment processing of accounts payable checks10.	Review the reconciliation between supplier statements of accounts and internal records11.	Prepares payment checks and obtains authorizations and approval.12.	Prepare reimburses, advance payments, accrue expenses, deposits, and another account current asset, and get necessary approval and process payments.13.	Support day-to-day operations relating to Banking activities and fund transfers and prepare Bank and Cash Reconcile.14.	Prepare Petty cash and daily cash flow with the Account Supervisor and Manager.15.	Other tasks assigned by the Account Manager.
Job Requirement: 1.	Bachelor’s degree in Accounting/Finance or other relevant skill 2.	Minimum of 2 or more years of working experience is an advantage3.	Ability to work in a team environment as well as independently.4.	Self-motivated with strong initiative. Attention to detail, and have a sense of urgency.5.	Understanding of double-entry bookkeeping6.	Proficiency with accounting software, like Quickbook, MS Excel, SAP, or Peachtree7.	Good in both written and spoken English.8.	Good negotiation skills, interpersonal skills, and problem-solving skills9.	Be flexible, honest, hard-working, able to work under pressure, and complete work with a deadline
