job title: Awareness and Service Quality Control Officer- Office Field (urgent)
position: Awareness and Service Quality Control Officer- Office Field (urgent)
Job Description:
Position Summary:
The main role of the “Awareness and Service Quality Control Officer Field/Office” of the Business Development and Awareness Department is to ensure the overall quality service that the company provides at best quality, and conduct workshops to promote best practices of households for waste management to lead to the cleanliness of city of the Cambodian Waste Management Company- 800 SUPER GAEA (CAMBODIA) CO., LTD.

•	Oversee 800 SUPER GAEA (CAMBODIA) CO., LTD to ensure that the collection service provide according to the collection schedule.
•	Finding the root problem of waste depo at streets and community and making plans to eliminate them,
•	Oversee cleanliness, environment, safety, etc of the operation; make reports and plan to line manager to implement better service. 
•	Work collaboratively and effectively with the operations team & departments within 
800 SUPER GAEA (CAMBODIA) CO., LTD to oversee all KHANs/Districts operations are being effectively implemented and the correct way. 
•	Support and collaborate with commune/Sangkat, khans’ authorities, and city hall to conduct or join environmental events, etc
•	Make expenses report of own department to finance department 
•	Support to staff for daily working of own department 
•	Support and communicate with the related department for the glass recycling project 
•	Record of own department inventories
•	Support for daily, weekly, and monthly progress reports to the line Manager.
•	Visit the field to solve complaints of service
•	Another task as per assigned by line manager-field and management
Job Requirement:
1.	Education Background: Bachelor’s Degree 
2.	Experience: At least 2 - 3 years of working experience in project implementation, M&E, development, and planning field or related.
3.	Language Khmer and English 
4.	Strong organizational, coordination,
5.	Computer literate (Microsoft Office and Internet – Email) google mapping is a must,
Soft Skill: Detail-oriented, Communication skills, Interpersonal skills, Problem-solving skills, Leadership Confident, self-motivated, working under pressure, time management, working without a supervisor is preferred good teamwork spirit, honesty, reliability, and of good character good operation and management skills; and excellent supervisory skills.
Good communication in English and Khmer
Flexible and quick learner, Willing to learn new things
Like to work with the waste management company
Good time management and interpersonal skills, Ability to work under tight deadlines and pressure.
Company Profile: 800 Super-GAEA Waste Management company has been granted the right to collect and transport solid waste in Zone 1 of Phnom Penh consisting of 5 districts such as Toul Kork, Chroy Changva, Russey Keo, Sen Sok and Prek Pnov starting from July 1, 2021.

Job Description: Position Summary:The main role of the “Quality Control– Field/office” of the Business Development and Awareness Department is to ensure overall quality service that the company provides the best quality, and reports from households about waste issues being solved to promote best practices between operation and households for waste management lead to the cleanliness of city of the Cambodian Waste Management Company- 800 SUPER GAEA (CAMBODIA) CO., LTD.•	Oversee 800 SUPER GAEA (CAMBODIA) CO., LTD to ensure that the collection service provide according to the collection schedule.•	Finding waste depo/ waste problem of 5khans / Districts •	Do Translate Khmer to English for the line manager•	Follow up, check, and monitor problem areas to be better implemented,  •	Visit the field to solve complaints to better service provide to communities,  •	Oversee to make sure collection schedule is being implemented, city cleanliness, environment, safety, etc of the operation and make a report to the line manager•	Work collaboratively and effectively with the operations team & departments within •	800 SUPER GAEA (CAMBODIA) CO., LTD.•	Support and collaborate with commune/Sangkat, khans’ authorities, and city hall to conduct or join environmental events •	Support for daily, weekly and monthly progress reports to line Manager.•	Another task as per assigned by the line manager-field and management
Job Requirement: 1.	Education Background: Bachelor’s Degree, a university student is also welcome 2.	Experience: At least 2 years of working experience in project implementation, monitoring, and evaluation field or related.3.	Language Khmer and English 4.	Strong organizational, coordination,5.	Computer literate (Microsoft Office and Internet – Email) google mapping is a must,Soft Skill: Detail-oriented, Communication skills, Interpersonal skills, Problem-solving skills, Leadership Confident, self-motivated, working under pressure, time management, working without a supervisor is preferred good teamwork spirit, honesty, reliability, and of good character good operation and management skills; and excellent supervisory skills. Ability to understand, patient, to support teamworkGood communication in English and KhmerFlexible and quick learner, Willing to learn new thingsLike to work with the waste management companyGood time management and interpersonal skills, Ability to work under tight deadlines and pressure.
Company Profile: 800 Super-GAEA Waste Management company has been granted the right to collect and transport solid waste in Zone 1 of Phnom Penh consisting of 5 districts such as Toul Kork, Chroy Changva, Russey Keo, Sen Sok and Prek Pnov starting from July 1, 2021.
Contact Info: Contact Information So Sothea  096 5370 546 / 017 771 183 hrm@800super-gaea.com Phnom Penh Lot A, Phsar Lech Village, Sangkat Prek Pnov, Khan Prek Phnov Phnom Penh, Cambodia. 096 5370 546 / 017 771 183

job title: Marketing Coordinator ( ចុះតាមខេត្ត )
position: Marketing Coordinator ( ចុះតាមខេត្ត )
Job Description:
Monitor company’s advertising and promotion and report to management.
- Carry out planned marketing activities efficiently in timely manner.
- Tracking and analyzing competitors’ advertising and promotion.
- Research and gather relevant market information to analyze latest market trend.
- Developing new initiatives continually to bring products brand to scale further heights.
- Establishing good relationships with media, handling press releases as well as 
  managing web initiatives
- Other tasks assigned by managements.
Job Requirement:
Cambodian nationality
- Bachelor Degree in Sales/Marketing or related field.
-  Minimum 1 year of experience in Sales and Marketing, preferred from automotive 
   industry.
-  Must be able to work well with diverse groups of people from various departments
- Strong interpersonal and communication skill.
- Familiar with MS. Office, Photoshop, Illustrator.

Contact Info: Contact Information Chea Puthdavann HR Manager 081 78 79 80 / 078 888 910 kng.hr@kongnuongroup.com : No. 219, Road 182, Sangkat Phsar Depo 1 Khan Toul Kork, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 081 78 79 80 / 078 888 910
